    • Constructor Detail

      • BloomFilter

        public BloomFilter(int n,
                   int m)
        Create a new bloom filter.
        Parameters:
        n - Expected number of elements
        m - Desired size of the container in bits

      • BloomFilter

        public BloomFilter(int n)
        Create a bloom filter of 1Mib.
        Parameters:
        n - Expected number of elements

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public void add(Object o)
        Add an element to the container

      • contains

        public boolean contains(Object o)
        Returns true if the element is in the container. Returns false with a probability ≈ 1-e^(-ln(2)² * m/n) if the element is not in the container.

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Removes all of the elements from this filter.

      • clone

        public BloomFilter clone()
                  throws CloneNotSupportedException
        Create a copy of the current filter
        Overrides:
        clone in class Object
        Throws:
        CloneNotSupportedException

      • hashCode

        public int hashCode()
        Generate a unique hash representing the filter
        Overrides:
        hashCode in class Object

      • equals

        public boolean equals(BloomFilter other)
        Test if the filters have equal bitsets. WARNING: two filters may contain the same elements, but not be equal (if the filters have different size for example).

      • merge

        public void merge(BloomFilter other)
        Merge another bloom filter into the current one. After this operation, the current bloom filter contains all elements in other.
